hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
#Set the below parameters manually package_name="cassandra" published_version="2.1.13"
#Check distro and available version in repo : rhel7.x, Sles11.x/12.x, Ub16.x/17.x . /etc/os-release if [ $ID == "rhel" ]; then available_version=$(sudo yum info $package_name | grep Version | head -1 | cut -d ':' -f 2| cut -d ' ' -f 2) elif [ $ID == "sles" ]; then available_version=$(sudo zypper info $package_name | grep Version | head -1 | cut -d ':' -f 2| cut -d ' ' -f 2) elif [ $ID == "ubuntu" ]; then available_version=$(sudo apt-get update && sudo apt-cache policy $package_name | grep Candidate | head -1 | cut -d ' ' -f 4) fi
if [[ $available_version == *"$published_version"* ]]; then echo "Version $published_version is already available in repo" echo "Exact name: $available_version ... Failing" exit 1 else echo "Published version is not available in repo. Going ahead." fi
sudo zypper install -y git \ git-core \ which \ java-1_7_0-openjdk-devel \ libstdc++-devel \ gcc-c++ \ make \ automake \ autoconf \ libtool \ tar \ wget \ patch \ words \ pkg-config
unset JAVA_TOOL_OPTIONS export LANG=en_US.UTF-8 export JAVA_TOOL_OPTIONS="-Dfile.encoding=UTF8"
wget http://archive.apache.org/dist/ant/binaries/apache-ant-1.9.2-bin.tar.gz tar -xvf apache-ant-1.9.2-bin.tar.gz cd apache-ant-1.9.2 export ANT_HOME=`pwd` cd bin export PATH=$PATH:`pwd`
cd /home/test/workspace/ApacheCassandra_2.1.13_SLES12-SP1_s390x/ rm -rf snappy-java git clone https://github.com/xerial/snappy-java.git cd snappy-java git checkout develop export JAVA_HOME=/usr/lib64/jvm/java-1.7.0 make IBM_JDK_7=1 USE_GIT=1 GIT_SNAPPY_BRANCH=1.1.4 GIT_REPO_URL=https://github.com/google/snappy.git
cd /home/test/workspace/ApacheCassandra_2.1.13_SLES12-SP1_s390x/cassandra rm ./lib/snappy-java-1.0.5.2.jar cp /home/test/workspace/ApacheCassandra_2.1.13_SLES12-SP1_s390x/snappy-java/target/snappy-java-1.1.3-SNAPSHOT.jar ./lib/snappy-java-1.1.3.jar
ant
#Note: Test cases have not executed on Jenkin Job due to required higher Timeout value.
#ant test
